name: Peruvian Green Chile Sauce (Aji Verde)
author: t-licious
summary: This is one of my favorite dips for bread. I also use it as a condiment for grilled steaks and pork chops. It's smooth, spicy, and very addictive! If you want even more spice, add additional jalapeno peppers.
ingredients: 3  jalapenos, seeds removed, or more to taste
4 tablespoons olive oil mayonnaise (such as Hellmann's®)
2 cloves garlic, or more to taste
¼ cup water, or as needed
1 teaspoon white wine vinegar, or more as needed
directions: Combine olive oil, cilantro, jalapenos, mayonnaise, and garlic in a blender and puree
Slowly add as little water as needed to create a smooth, creamy consistency
Season with white wine vinegar and salt
